11.content:
Spongebob's timer beeped.

Spongebob: I'm late for work!

Then Spongebob saw Patrick.

Spongebob: Oh, hi Patrick!

Patrick: Hey, Spongebob. 1 Krabby Kids Meal, please.

Spongebob made the meal, and the robot gave a toy.

Patrick sat in front of Pearl, and he ate the kids meal without touching the toy. Then Pearl dug it out.

Pearl: Do you want this?

What she and Spongebob did NOT know, the toy was given by a robot separately. And the toy was RADIOACTIVE! Which caused Pearl to...
11.title: Spongebob Squarepants

112.content:
Suddenly, the kitchen violently shook, causing Spongebob to lose his hat. Pearl instantly shrunk to 3'. Then, another violent shake caused Spongebob to lose his spatula. Pearl shrunk to 1' 6''. Then the most violent shake occured, causing Spongebob to shake into the dining room and crash into the walls. Pearl shrunk to 3'' tall.

Spongebob: What the? Oh, hi Patrick! I think Pearl must be gone.

Patrick: I need tweezers to pick up my toy.

Spongebob: What?

Spongebob looked down at Pearl.

Spongebob: I am so fired.

Patrick: Why?

Spongebob: Because we need an opposite reaction to this.

So Spongebob used his 20-foot tall tweezers to carry the toy to the trash can.

So Spongebob, with his tweezers, picked up a box of toys and laid them down.

When Pearl picked one up, she...
112.title: Shrink.

1123.content:
Every part of her inflated.

Once she stopped inflating, Spongebob deflated her to the same height.

Spongebob: No good!

Pearl picked up a toy, making her...
1123.title: Inflated.

11231.content:
The entire Krusty Krab shook.

Pearl instantly grew to 1' 6''.

Spongebob: Yes!

Then she grew to 3'.

Spongebob: I'm saved!

She grew to her normal height again.

Then she...
11231.title: Grow.

112311.content:
She stopped growing at normal height. And just in time! Spongebob heard his timer beeping.

Spongebob: Hey, my shift's over.
112311.title: Stopped.

1123111.content:
Spongebob is walking home, everything normal, throwing away the toys. You completed the Spongebob Squarepants storyline. Find out the characters at nick.com/spongebob.

Watch Spongebob on Nickelodeon / Nicktoons.
1123111.title: CN XD's ending

choices: They try to puff her back up.
They try to give her a weight gain toy.
1151.content:
She instantly lost weight. Eventually her weight matched that of Barnacle Boy's.

Spongebob: I am so fired.

All that weight loss made Pearl's voice even higher pitched.

Patrick: Oh...
1151.title: Weight loss.

choices: They find the princess, 60 feet tall!
They find the princess, gaining weight.
They find nothing, and Puppycat said she's in Fishbowl Space.
12.content:
It's been months since Puppycat the cat (or dog) and Bee the human has been reported to temp work. Puppycat told Bee of the space outlaw and princess. They even got cash for temp work. Puppycat thought of what he should spend his money on.

Bee: So bored...

Puppycat: (translation) Uhhhh...

Bee: Yeah, so boring...

Puppycat: Uhhh...

Bee: Can you stop that?

Puppycat: (Translation) I want to spend my money on equipment to scare the space outlaw away.

Bee: You mean?

Puppycat: (translation) Yeah, there's more. The princess kept on growing and growing and growing and growing and growing and growing and growing and growing and growing and growing-

Bee: Stop saying she grew so much!

Puppycat: (translation) I'm not finished. The princess might have inflated or gained weight or become a giantess. Nobody knows.

Bee: Until now.

Several months ago...

Bee: You took too long. Now your candy's gone. That's what happened. Pu-kaw!

Present day...

Bee: Well, I'm going to find out! Come on, Puppycat!
12.title: Bee & Puppycat

125.content:
Bee: You liar! Let's go!

You completed the Bee & Puppycat storyline too early. To find out about the show, go to www.frederatorstudios.com.

Watch the two-part episode on Frederator's Youtube channel, Cartoon Hangover or on Nintendo Video.

"Why did you guys wake me up so early?"
Timmy Turner, The Really Bad Day!

"Why are you here so early?"
SpongeBob SquarePants, Just One Bite

"Wait! You said 8 o'clock!"
SpongeBob SquarePants, The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
125.title: CN XD's ending

13.content: One day while collecting souls, Kid was blocked by a massive wall of flesh. It was...
13.title: Soul Eater

14.content:
Sheldon: Every scientist knows that people cannot risk to drink this stuff.

Raj: I would not take the risk!

Penny took the risk...
14.title: The Big Bang Theory

choices: She was having a lot of children.
145.content: So Penny drank it. She then felt a sharp pain...
145.title: Pregnancy.

1453.title: She was having a lot of children.

151.content:
Phineas: Hey! Where's Perry?

Isabella: Hey Phineas- AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!

Phineas: ISABELLA!

Isabella: Phineas?

Isabella had gained 120 pounds.

Then, at Doofenshmirtz Evil Inc...

ZAP! ZAP! ZAP!

The rays keep hitting Isabella. She kept on gaining weight.
151.title: Phineas and Ferb

152.content: Agent DiNozzo and Agent Gibbs were on break, drinking their coffee until...
152.title: NCIS

1521.content: They ran out of coffee. So Agent Gibbs wanted a second cup. So did Agent DiNozzo.
1521.title: They run out of coffee.

15211.content: They get a second cup, drinking it. They would like Abby to have...
15211.title: They get a second cup.

choices: She was bigger than Lil' Gideon.
She was bigger than a house.
153.content: While Dipper read his book, Mabel was caught by Lil' Gideon. And Lil' Gideon, 45 seconds later, snatched the book. He turned to a page that Dipper hasn't seen before. He used the things on Mabel, expanding her by one inch per body part. She became taller by her legs. Eventually...
153.title: Gravity Falls

1531.content: Mabel gasps as she now stood 10 ft tall, then she grins down at Dipper and picks him up, hugging, saying "You forgot to grow my shoes! Not like I really mind though." and she wiggles her toes, laughing. She stretches out, asking Dipper how tall the shack's ceiling is, he replies 9 ft high, then she asks Dipper to measure her, he quickly does so and says "10 feet, sis. You're the tallest person to ever live." then she grins at that last part, telling Dipper he could call the record books. After a few days, Mabel was absolutely famous, the tallest human to ever live. Stan's revenue went up more than 300%, and tourists went up 200%. Mabel was happy, and famous. What's next?
1531.title: She was bigger than Lil' Gideon.

choices: He manages to find a method to get her out.
15312.content: Mabel yawns as she wakes up, stretching, the bed creaking under her. She noticed something was.. Off. But, how often were things normal for a 10 ft tall 12 year old? She stands up and hits her head, she yelps out of surprise and rubs her head, noticing something.. She had grown again! 20 ft tall! She sits and smiles, calling out "Dipper! Come see me!" then he rushes in, gasping as he was met with a foot almost bigger than Wendy's whole body! He pokes the foot and Mabel giggles, wiggling her toes, saying "I grew again!" and he says "I can tell! We need to get you out of the room in case you grow again.." then he tries to find some way to help Mabel get outside.
15312.title: More growth!

choices: They rebuild the shack, but bigger!
153122.content: As Dipper keeps flipping through the pages, Mabel says "Dipper." but he doesn't notice, she keeps trying to get his attention two more times, on the third attempt, he did notice because her feet were even bigger than Wendy's whole body now. Mabel giggles as her feet begin to press against the wall. He gulps, saying "We need to get outside.." then her feet knock the wall down as they grow right through it. Next her head, then her shoulders, and Dipper got everyone out of the shack, Mabel began to get too big for the shack to support, and boom, the entire shack was under her growing tush. She giggles, lifting Dipper up and hugging him. She was 160 ft tall, taller than the statue of liberty! And her feet were as big, or bigger, than city buses! She grins.
153122.title: She outgrows the room.

choices: Mabel enjoys life being 200 ft tall!
1531221.content: A few days later, they began to rebuild the shack. Mabel was a huge help, literally! They had built Mabel her own shack made specifically for her, and the normal shack. Mabel smiles as she lays in the new bed, relaxing. Over the course of building the shack, she had grown to 200 ft. Her feet were quickly approaching the size of a blue whale. She heard a knock and said "Come in~" then Dipper walks in and hugs her toe, asking her how she was feeling. She smiles, saying "I'm feeling great, toe-bro!" then he laughs, little (pun intended) nicknames for him were common now, some of which includes tiny tree, toe-sized bro, and the most recent, toe-bro. He didn't mind, cause he was truly tiny in comparison to her body. He was smaller than her toe! Well, everyone was, to be fair!
1531221.title: They rebuild the shack, but bigger!

15312212.content: Pacifica, having heard about it, comes and knocks on Mabel's door, Mabel invites her in, Pacifica stares upwards and says "And here I thought your feet couldn't get any bigger." and her and Mabel began laughing. Mabel responds with "Your feet were bigger than mine!" and Pacifica says "Pff. So what? Yours are prettier." with a laugh, Mabel blushes a bit as Pacifica begins to hug Mabel's toe.
15312212.title: Mabel enjoys life being 200 ft tall!

1531221221.content: Pacifica laughs, hugging Mabel's toe again, after a few minutes, Pacifica says "Mabel.. I'm feeling a little.. weird.." then Mabel lifts up and hugs her tiny friend before she notices something.. Pacifica was wearing shoes when she came in! Mabel sees the shreds of her shoes down below and says "You're growing!" then Mabel sits her down, Pacifica gasps, then grins as she rapidly gains size. She surpasses Mabel and now stands 225 ft tall! Mabel laughs and says "Told you that your feet were bigger!" as she puts her foot against Pacifica's, Pacifica's foot was 75 ft long, while Mabel's was only 61. Pacifica had big feet at normal size!
1531221221.title: Pacifica grows!

153122122211.content: Dipper was flipping through the pages of the journal, attempting to find the spell that grew Mabel to her astounding 200 ft height. Dipper quickly ran outside as he cast the growth spell. He was quickly passing up the mystery shack's own 2 story height. He kept growing, growing, and growing, surpassing even the height of Mabel's custom shack, and upwards he grew.. 400 ft is where he stopped. He laughs, his feet were bigger than the biggest whale! His feet were 126 ft, the biggest whale to ever live was only 111 ft! Dipper laughs, his feet were nearly as big as the statue of liberty! He stretches out and calls for Mabel. When Mabel sees him she..
153122122211.title: Dipper!

153122122221.content: Who will worship her feet?
153122122221.title: Mabel gets some foot worship!

153122122221221.content: A few hours after Pacifica's visit, Mabel called for Dipper, who walked into Mabel's giant building, he asks "What do you need, Mabel?" then she wiggles her toes and says "Some love for my feet~" with a bright smile on her face. Dipper rolls his eyes and walks over to her bus-sized feet, saying "Mabel. They're the size of buses. How can I give them any love?" then she gives him some climbing gear, giggling as she puts the end of the rope around her big toe, saying "Gotta climb it, little bro bro~" then he slips into the climbing gear, asking her where he should start. She decides the toes. He climbs up her bus-sized foot and begins rubbing her toe, she lets out a loud sigh of relief, relaxing. It took Dipper 14 hours, but he was finally finished. He had licked, rubbed, and massaged every inch of her nearly 60 ft long feet.
153122122221221.title: Dipper

choices: .."Okay, Mabel. You can grow more." (Pleases her.)
.."I can't do that, Mabel! You're a giant!" (She steals the book for herself.)
1532.content: Mabel gasps as she began to grow, after her uneven growth evened out, leaving her at a smooth 25 ft tall, taller than some two stories, she grinned down at her brother, the size of her barefeet shocking Dipper. She picks him up and asks "How about a bit more, little bro-bro?" then Dipper thought it over, unsure how to reply. He replied with..
1532.title: She was bigger than a house.

1533.content: Stick with Mabel growing into a giant, or shall Dipper be the giant?
1533.title: She was a metaphorical whale.

15332.content: Dipper blinks, Mabel's growth stops after she was about 10 ft, but then he starts to tingle, feeling his own body growing. He gasps, but quickly begins to like it, stretching further and further into the sky, he grinned down at his now smaller twin. He stops at about 25 ft tall, his feet bare. He smirks at Mabel and asks "So, who's the alpha twin now?"
15332.title: Dipper the giant pine tree!

choices: Starfire grew to 200 feet in 40 seconds!
154.content: Robin crashed into Titans Tower and said, "I think my staff is undergoing a growth spurt." Starfire came by with Silkie in her hands. "So am I," she said. Robin said, "Is it just me or did Starfire grow overnight?" He had to warn her and Silkie at all costs. Starfire felt offended by this and said, "My little bumgorf, let's go." The next day she woke up 12 feet tall. She is growing at an incredibly fast, but not instant, rate.
154.title: Teen Titans Go!

choices: Raven expanded the tower via remodeling.
1542.content: The next morning it was the usual: Robin planning a "staff" meeting, Starfire caring for Silkie, Raven using her magic to help around the tower, and Cyborg and Beast Boy eating cheese pizza. Except now Starfire was growing. She was gentle around the others. She decided to get out. Robin then had an idea.
1542.title: The next morning...

15421.content: First, Raven grew the ground around the tower to 3000 feet in circumference. Then, it took 20 seconds, but Raven finished the 10000000000' tall tower that went beyond the moon but remained in the atmosphere. Raven was great at her work. Cyborg eventually saw what the heck Raven has been working on. Beast Boy decided to go up to the tower. It was risky at first (and tiring), but he floated up for the rest of the climb and went to his zero gravity room.
15421.title: Raven expanded the tower via remodeling.

154211.content: Robin found Starfire and Silkie on the ground floor. Starfire decided to give Silkie some berries, but she chose the wrong kind. "Let's not feed THESE to Silkie. Don't you remember, Star?" Of course she didn't. So Robin had to flashback to the point where Silkie ate them and turned evil. Then they had to defeat him. Starfire realized that these were bad for Silkie. So she used heat vision on the zorkaberries and blew them up, burning Robin in the process. He said, "That extra height has got to go!"
154211.title: Starfire grew to 50 ft.

1542112.content:
Robin used a pill from the bottle labeled, "Shrinky Pills. One pill makes you shrink 20''. Two pills make you shrink 40'', three makes you shrink 60'', and so on. Do NOT take with water." "Take WITH water! Chug it down!" Robin excitedly said. Starfire did, but she grew to 100 ft. Robin realized it. He read the bottle again, with IMPORTANT info: "Do NOT take with water or subject will GROW." So Robin had to pop each pill into her. She shrunk to about 30 feet tall. Pill popping again, Starfire shrunk to normal size.

Robin had to shrink the tower. As Beast Boy was about to reach the top of the tower, it shrunk down to original size, with Beast Boy falling down 12'' to the ground. So the tower was normal.
1542112.title: He used a pill.

15421121.content:
Starfire had a load of that- I mean, you completed the storyline for Teen Titans Go! To find more about the characters, check out the Teen Titans Go! wiki.

Watch Teen Titans Go! Tuesdays at 7:30pm on Cartoon Network.
15421121.title: CN XD's ending

choices: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
155.title: more

choices: Grew as big as the library.
Outgrew the library and kept going.
OUTGREW the library and kept going.
1551.content: Pinkie Pie, running the Sugarcube Corner, accidentally ate a magical cake, causing her to expand. Soon she moved to a better location as not to stop her growth. She almost knocked over Sugarcube Corner, so she asked Twilight Sparkle for help. Twilight knew what the cake was. Pinkie...
1551.title: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

1552.content: Johnny drank a potion that gave him the ability to grow and shrink people and objects at will. Grow Susan, Mary, or Both?
1552.title: Johnny Test

155231.content: Johnny grins, saying "I've always wanted to be a bit taller!" then he begins to inch up to 7 ft. His shoes ripping to shreds, Dukey tugs on Johnny's leg and asks "Isn't 7 ft too big?!" then Johnny says "Or is it not enough?" and grows again, to 9 ft. Dukey gulps, deciding not to say anything else. The next day at school, he was popular! His new 9 ft body made him the talk of the school, and all the girls were swooning over him!
155231.title: Himself instead?

1552311.content: Johnny grins as he ducks under his door frame into his room, saying "If 9 foot is better, then being bigger would be even better!" and he decides..
1552311.title: Johnny grows again!

15523112.content: He smirks as he ducks into the lab, saying "Hey, tiny sisters. I need a favor." knowing they could not resist his growing body.
15523112.title: To visit his sisters first!

1553.content: A whole bunch of choices...
1553.title: more

15532.content: Rudy Tabootie was in trouble with the bully. He has done it! He made a female version of Snap, one of his drawings. The female is going to end up in ChalkZone, Rudy thought. He was right. The bully erased his drawing. Although Rudy complained to his teacher about bullying, the principal made him write 500 times, "Cartoons are not funny". When he was at his 180th time, his regular chalk SNAPPED! So Rudy needed a new piece of chalk. To his wonder, he wants to know how Snap's doing. So he drew up the female Snap in Extra-Large-Piece-O-Chalk (a version of Lightning Chalk). He does not know that whoever is drawn with that kind of chalk and ends up in ChalkZone...
15532.title: ChalkZone

155321.content: The next drawing was of Conker the squirrel with regular chalk, and Berri the chipmunk with Extra-Large-Piece-O-Chalk. Both sent to Chalkzone. Snap arrives and tells Rudy he plagiarized Conker the Squirrel. And ChalkZone became wrecked. And the Extra-Large-Piece-O-Chalk. Rudy totally paid the price for it.
155321.title: Conker the drawing (by Rudy Tabootie)

choices: The heck, send them to Chalkzone!
155322.content: Rudy decided to experiment. He drew Timmy Turner, himself, and XJ-9 (Jenny). He sent them off to Chalkzone. As a result, he wanted 500 Jennys. But before he got to his 211th one, Snap drew a circle at the far end of the chalkboard. Rudy wanted to explain that he was in the middle of creating Jennys. But Snap was furious. He told Rudy about dystopia and totalitarianism and stuff like that. Rudy was confused. He created 210 Jennys and that is enough for THAT?
155322.title: Snap vs. Totalitarianism

1553221.content: Rudy sent them to ChalkZone. Snap was more furious now. Snap told Rudy about that chalk. Rudy felt guilty. He went to dispose of the Extra-Large-Pieces-O-Chalk. When they got up and drew 1,000,000,000,000 Jennys. Rudy thought they were going to keep them. But the erasers erased. Rudy insisted he go to Twilight Sparkle, but Snap told Rudy that the chalk cannot send them to anywhere but the Real World and ChalkZone. So Rudy insisted he need Penny's (not Jenny's) help.
1553221.title: And Rudy did it again!

1553222.content: Rudy erased the Jennys from existence. Rudy drew the main female cast member of Futurama with that same chalk. Snap was furious.
1553222.title: Use a Lightning Eraser.

choices: Every Heartless Sora fought made Namine grow upwards.
Every Heartless Sora fought made Namine grow outwards.
155331.content: Sora, Donald Duck, and Goofy have been on several adventures. Finally Sora worked up the courage to talk to Namine. But he is in for a enormous surprise...
155331.title: Kingdom Hearts

choices: Heartless appear, and Sora was right!
Heartless appear, and Sora defeated way less than a million!
1553311.content:
Sora thought that interrogating Namine would do some good. He stopped. Namine was about 50 feet tall.

"50 divided by the number of Heartless I beat, 1 inch per Heartless... I must have defeated 1,000,000 Heartless!" Sora exclaimed.

It wasn't over.
1553311.title: Every Heartless Sora fought made Namine grow up...

1553321.content:
Timmy turner was in his room watching King Kong vs Godzilla on his television and of course had a special wish in mind.

Timmy turner: Cosmo, Wanda, I wish i can transform into either Godzilla or King Kong! he told his fairies.

Soon enough, his fairies with concerned expressions on their faces granted his wish as Timmy transformed into one of the monsters?

But the question was which one did Timmy transform into?
1553321.title: Fairly Odd Parents

155332121.content:
After granting Timmy's wish he transformed into King Kong as he outgrew the house itself as his shadow was looming over his neighborhood.

"So this is what it's like being King Kong the 8th wonder of the world, in other words a classic giant monster." Timmy said.

"Uh Timmy I've got a bad feeling about this, after all King Kong did cause trouble all across New York City and not to mention Tokyo since he was fighting Godzilla and all that." Wanda said with great concern in her voice.

"But after all it was just a movie or two of course, so Timmy now that you're King Kong what are you going to do next?" Cosmo asked Timmy.

"Well Cosmo that depends on what happens next." Timmy answered.

Soon enough....
155332121.title: Stay with King Kong

1553322.content: Well, how about the hedgehog siblings Sonic, Manic, & Sonia?
1553322.title: more

15533221.content:
Sonic is bored...

Dr. Robotnik passed a law that hurt Mobian business. Inflation is rising to the roof! Pretty soon, Mobius will discover the Robotnik war, which Sonic thought was good. Worst case scenario, Aleena could never come back to power.
15533221.title: Sonic Underground

choices: He heads back to the Crystal Gems.
155332221.content:
Steven: Aww! They're out of Cookie Cats?

Store Manager: Well, delivery isn't for 3 to 7 days.

Steven: WHAT?

Store Manager: In the meantime, buy Lion Lickers...

Steven: But nobody likes them! If only Uncle Grandpa or the FBI were here...
155332221.title: Steven Universe

1553322212.content:
Steven headed back to the Crystal Gems. He was in for a surprise...

Steven: WOAH! What happened?

Crystal Gem #3: Well...
1553322212.title: He heads back to the Crystal Gems.

155332222.content:
---Monday---

Rowley invites me over to his house to watch educational videos.

I wanted to watch Cartoon Network XD. So I did.

But for some reason, Mr. Jefferson doesn't like us watching CN XD after 11:30pm.
155332222.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid

1553322221.content:
---Tuesday---

I saw Dad, shipping supplies. Then Rodrick showed up. Rodrick is my older brother. He plays heavy metal all day.

We watched a video about the British and the Revolutionary War and stuff like that. I fell asleep at the very end.

Holly Hills has just hit her growth spurt; She grew taller than Heather Hills.

Heather Hills is Holly's sister.
1553322221.title: Tuesday

15533222211.content:
---Wednesday---

Holly Hills was 8 feet tall, and still growing. She was taller than me.

The last person you wanna make ticked off is Mr. Jefferson. And Fregley. Fregley has been by himself, but I saw a mini Ruby Bird, asked to run. I told her to relax. I gave Fregley sugar. Fregley ran and ran. He sugar crashed on his bed. Ruby relaxed. Holly stepped outta town...

Ruby Bird started outgrowing the jar and shattered it. Then she grew to normal size.

Holly Hills came back, 100' tall. She grabbed Bryce Anderson, the most popular kid in my grade, ate him, and grew to 1000' tall. She headed toward Jordan Jury, ate HIM, and grew to 10000' tall. She grabbed the kids I was stuck with at a certain period (Chris Hosey & Lionel James), ate THEM, and grew to 100000'. She grabbed Strong Steve and ate him, growing her to a million feet tall.
15533222211.title: By Wednesday (1)

155332222111.content:
---Thursday---

Everyone was paranoid about Holly The Evil Giantess. I thought that would wear off by now. For the past week, Rowley has been hanging out with a Futurama cast member.

Futurama is an animated comedy for adults, why would Rowley watch it?

I saw an ad two weeks ago, and it said that Nickelodeon, the first kids network, is coming to Cartoon Network XD as Nick on CBS. There was a Nick on CBS block on CBS before Cookie Jar TV took over. So I thought CN XD was doing a favor by resurrecting that same block- until I found out the shows and runtime, and that's when I saw it: Soul Eater! Nickelodeon shows should be on the block, not adult comedies and anime! I had to lock up my room for that same Saturday morning, which is two days from now.
155332222111.title: Thursday

1553322221111.content:
---Friday---

I had to invite Rowley and Fregley over. I found out what is going on: Rowley and whoever plays Leela isn't a good match.
1553322221111.title: Friday

15533222211111.content:
---Saturday---

Today was the resurrection of the block for Nick on CBS. By midnight last night, Holly the giantess was no more: She became good and barfed up all the people she ate and shrunk down to normal size. It will take a week AT LEAST to clean up.
15533222211111.title: Saturday

155332222111111.content:
---Sunday---

Looks like that was 6 chapters, so this is THE END.

-------------------------------

You have completed the Diary of a Wimpy Kid storyline! This storyline was told from Greg Heffley's POV. To find out about the book series, search on Wikipedia.

To find out about Futurama and the charas, search on Wikipedia.

Read all 7 books of Diary of a Wimpy Kid, or view all 3 live-action movies.

Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Hard Luck coming 2014!

Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Cabin Fever animated adaption coming December 2013!
155332222111111.title: CN XD's ending

15533222212.content:
---Wednesday---

Remind me never to fall for that giantess trick again. Yesterday Rodrick told me that Holly Hills will keep growing. She stopped at 6'8''. And who should see that but Piper Matthews. Piper Matthews is basically Holly's online counterpart. Then that gave me an idea- a sweet idea!

I could give Piper Matthews the biggest surprise money can buy- a helium tank, stuck to her mouth.

But first of all, I have ZERO money. Second of all, real body inflation does NOT exist.

So I called Rowley Jefferson over. He said he'll be there.

Two hours later, he arrives. I'm starting to think if he went to a Joshie concert.

So I told him two things.

The first is if he brought a helium tank. The second is if he wanted to sleep over here tonight. He said yes to both.

His parents agreed to the sleepover, and we looked up "Body Inflation" and stuff like that.

I was shocked when an ad for a "2DS" and stuff like that pulled up. Then a "Lil' Cutie" ad. Lil' Cutie is the worst comic in the newspaper.

I'm pretty sure that Fregley isn't going to barge in and ruin the fun. So we turned in for the night.
15533222212.title: By Wednesday (2)

info.brief_description: The sequel to the Cartoon Network XD Interactive!
info.description:
CN XD Interactive 2 rules:

You can add several shows (or all) from the prequel, but stick to a different storyline.

New shows can be in this sequel.

If weight gain, no "Cassia Reyes gained 10000000000000000 pounds in one night".

Starfire cannot gain 70 pounds from a feast. (Teen Titans Go! storyline only)

No cussing.

Some of the same rules from the prequel apply in this Interactive.

Not applied:
The Animated Kids shows / live action shows only rule.

Need new chapters!

Update 1: 40 chapters, and 100 views! Of course, I had to create the chapters...

Enjoy!
